resources.string: I-chatbot ezokusiza ukuthi ufunde futhi icacise ukungabaza mayelana nempilo yokunakekelwa kwezingane.
Funda kabanzi mayelana nezihloko ezahlukene mayelana nokuncelisa ibele.
Bheka emibuzweni ehlukahlukene ehambisana kangcono nokungabaza kwakho.
Gcina imilayezo ewusizo noma izithombe njengezinto ozithandayo ukuze uzibheke esikhathini esizayo.
Dala i-akhawunti yomzali ngamunye kanye namaphrofayela ahlukene ezingane zakho.
Igama alikwazi ukuba ngaphezu kwezinhlamvu eziyi-10
Uma ucabanga ukuthi kukhona okungahambi kahle ngengane yakho, xhumana nodokotela womndeni wakho noma udokotela wezingane, noma ushayele abezimo eziphuthumayo.
Ukwesekwa kwamahora angu-24 kubantu baseNingizimu Afrika abasengozini yokuzibulala.
Esimeni sokungabaza noma imibuzo ehlobene nesicelo noma okuqukethwe kwayo.
Amahora angama-24 othintana naye wesevisi yezimo eziphuthumayo nesevisi yokuhlenga
Awukwazi ukuba namaphrofayili angaphezu kwamathathu ngesikhathi esisodwa. Cindezela isikhathi eside kuphrofayela ukuze uyisuse.

"I-chatbot u-Aurora2 idinga ukuqoqa ulwazi mayelana nabantu abayisebenzisayo. Ngakhoke, le nqubo mgomo ichaza ukuthi i-data yomuntu kufanele iqoqwe, iphathwe, futhi igcinwe kanjani ukuze kuhlangatshezwane nezimiso zenkampani zokuvikelwa kwedata – futhi kuhanjiswane nomthetho. "

" Lenqubomgomo yokuvikelwa kwe-data iqinisekisa ukuthi i-chatbot i-Aurora2: •\tUhambisana nomthetho wokuvikelwa kwe-data futhi ulandela imikhuba emihle. •\tIvikela amalungelo abasebenzi, abantu abayisebenzisayo kanye nalabo ababambisene nabo. •\tIkubeka obala ukuthi iyingcina kanjani futhi iyicwaninga kanjani i-data yalabo abayisebenzisayo. •\tIzivikele ezingozini zokuphulwa kwe-data. "

"Umthetho wokuvikelwa kwolwazi ojwayelekile 2016/679 uchaza ngezindlela izinhlangano ekufanele ziqoqe ngayo, ziphathe futhi zigcine ngayo imininingwane yomuntu okubala ne chatbot Aurora2. POPIA ACT SA Lemithetho isebenza kungakhathalekile ukuthi ulwazi lugcinwa nge-computer, ngephepha noma ngezinye izinto. Ukuze kungcinwe imithetho, imininingwano yomuntu kumele iqoqwe futhi isetshenziswe ngendlela enobulungiswa, Igcinwe ngokuphephile futhi ingadalulwa ngoku ngekho semthethweni. Ukuze kungcinwe imithetho, imininingwano yomuntu, kumelwe iqoqwe futhi isetshenziswe ngendlela enobulungiswa, Igcinwe ngokuphephile futhi Ingadalulwa ngoku ngekho semthethweni. "

"I-chatbot u-Aurora2 idinga ukuqoqa ulwazi mayelana nabantu abayisebenzisayo. Ngakhoke, le nqubo mgomo ichaza ukuthi i-data yomuntu kufanele iqoqwe, iphathwe, futhi igcinwe kanjani ukuze kuhlangatshezwane nezimiso zenkampani zokuvikelwa kwedata – futhi kuhanjiswane nomthetho. "
" Lenqubomgomo yokuvikelwa kwe-data iqinisekisa ukuthi i-chatbot i-Aurora2: •"

"Umthetho wokuvikelwa kwolwazi ojwayelekile 2016/679 uchaza ngezindlela izinhlangano ekufanele ziqoqe ngayo, ziphathe futhi zigcine ngayo imininingwane yomuntu okubala ne chatbot Aurora2. POPIA ACT SA Lemithetho isebenza kungakhathalekile ukuthi ulwazi lugcinwa nge-computer, ngephepha noma ngezinye izinto. Ukuze kungcinwe imithetho, imininingwano yomuntu kumele iqoqwe futhi isetshenziswe ngendlela enobulungiswa, Igcinwe ngokuphephile futhi ingadalulwa ngoku ngekho semthethweni. Ukuze kungcinwe imithetho, imininingwano yomuntu, kumelwe iqoqwe futhi isetshenziswe ngendlela enobulungiswa, Igcinwe ngokuphephile futhi Ingadalulwa ngoku ngekho semthethweni. "
Kwa Aurora2, siqoqa futhi siphatha i-data ngokuhambisana nemigomo elandelalo.

"Siqoqa imininingwane osinikeza yona ngokuqondile. Isibonelo, siqoqa ulwazi uma uvula i-account, ubhalisa, ukubamba iqhaza kunoma yiziphi izici ezisebenzisanayo nezinsiza zethu, ukugcwalisa iphepha, ucela ukwesekwa kwamakhasimende noma uxhumana nathi ngenye indlela. Izinhlobo zemininingwane esingayiqoqa zihlanganisa igama lakho, ikheli le-email, ikheli leposi, imininingwane yekhadi lesikweletu kanye neminye imininingwane yokuxhumana noma yokuhlonza ozikhethele wena ukuyinikeza. Siqoqa imininingwane eyimfihlo evela kuzo zonke izivakashi ze-Website ukuqapha i-traffic nokulungisa ama-bugs. Isibonelo, siqoqa ulwazi olufana nezicelo ze-web, i-data ethunyelwe ekuphenduleni lezo zicelo, ikheli le-Internet Protocol, uhlobo lwe-browser, ulimi lwe-browser, nesitembu sesikhathi sesicelo. Siphinda sisebenzise nobuchwepheshe obuhlukahlukene ukuze siqoqe imininingwane, futhi lokhu kungahlanganisa ukuthumela ama-cookies kwi-computer yakho. Ama-cookies ama-file amancane e-data agcinwe kwi-hard drive yakho noma kwi-memory ydevice yakho asisiza ukuba sithuthukise izinsiza zethu kanye nokuhlangabenzane nakho , sibone ukuthi yiziphi izindawo nezici zezinsiza zethu ezithandwayo futhi sibale ukuvakashelwa. Singase futhi siqoqe ulwazi ngokusebenzisa ama-web beacons (aziwa ngokuthi \"ama-Pixels okulandelela\"). Ama-web beacons ayizithombe ze-eletronic ezingasetshenziswa kwizinsiza zethu noma kuma-email futhi ukulandelela inani lokuvakashelwa noma ukuqonda ukusetshenziswa nokusebenza ngempumelelo komkhankaso. Inqubomgomo yethu Yobumfihlo yakhiwe ngosizo lwe- Generator yethemulethi ye-Privacy Policy. "
Kwa Aurora2, siqoqa futhi siphatha i-data ngokuhambisana nemigomo elandelalo.

Inqubomgomo yethu Yobumfihlo yakhiwe ngosizo lwe- Generator yethemulethi ye-Privacy Policy. "
